<<<<<<< HEAD
Reflexions upon the oathes of supremacy and allegiance by a Catholick gentleman, and obedient son of the church, and loyal subject of His Majesty. Sergeant, John, 1622-1707.
96 p.
s.n.], [London : MDCLXI [1661]
Attributed to John Sergeant by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints. Also attributed to John Austin and Hugh Paulinus Cressy--NUC pre-1956 imprints. Place of publication suggested by Wing. Errata on p. [2] Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======
